summary: A charming Arabian sheik becomes infatuated with an adventurous, modern-thinking Englishwoman and abducts her to his home in the Saharan desert.
cast: Rudolph Valentino|Agnes Ayres|Ruth Miller|George Waggner|Frank Butler|Charles Brinley|Lucien Littlefield|Adolphe Menjou|Walter Long|Sally Blane|Earl Gordon Bostwick|Sidney Bracey|Rafael Negrete|Natacha Rambova|Loretta Young|Polly Ann Young
